languages.text: Застывший в скрюченной позе мертвец оторопело смотрит на свои отломанные ледяные конечности.

traits.locale_text: Застывший в скрюченной позе мертвец оторопело смотрит на свои отломанные ледяные конечности.

languages.text: Frozen in a huddled pose, the corpse stares at his icy, shattered limbs in disbelief.
languages.original_text: Застывший в скрюченной позе мертвец оторопело смотрит на свои отломанные ледяные конечности.

traits.locale_text: Even in death the curled-up corpse stares at his frozen, shattered limbs with a dumbfounded disbelief.
Even in death the curled-up corpse stares at his frozen, shattered limbs with a dumbfounded disbelief.
Frozen in a huddled pose, the corpse stares at his icy, shattered limbs in disbelief.
Frozen in a huddled pose, the corpse stares at his icy, shattered limbs in disbelief.
Frozen in a huddled pose, the corpse stares at his icy, shattered limbs in disbelief.

languages.text: 这具尸体被冻得蜷缩起来。死者脸上带着难以置信的表情，盯着自己冰冷、破碎的躯体。
languages.original_text: Frozen in a huddled pose, the corpse stares at his icy, shattered limbs in disbelief.

traits.locale_text: 这具尸体被冻得蜷缩起来。死者脸上带着难以置信的表情，盯着自己冰冷、破碎的躯体。

languages.text: Congelado en posición acurrucada, el cadáver observa sus extremidades gélidas y rotas con incredulidad.
languages.original_text: Frozen in a huddled pose, the corpse stares at his icy, shattered limbs in disbelief.

traits.locale_text: Congelado en posición acurrucada, el cadáver observa sus extremidades gélidas y rotas con incredulidad.

languages.text: うずくまった凍死体は、信じられないといった様子で粉々になった冷たい手足を見つめている。
languages.original_text: Frozen in a huddled pose, the corpse stares at his icy, shattered limbs in disbelief.

traits.locale_text: うずくまった凍死体は、信じられないといった様子で粉々になった冷たい手足を見つめている。

languages.text: Dans une position recroquevillée, le cadavre regarde d'un air incrédule ses membres gelés qui se sont brisés en mille morceaux.
languages.original_text: Frozen in a huddled pose, the corpse stares at his icy, shattered limbs in disbelief.

traits.locale_text: Dans une position recroquevillée, le cadavre regarde d'un air incrédule ses membres gelés qui se sont brisés en mille morceaux.

languages.text: Die Leiche ist in gebückter Haltung eingefroren und starrt ungläubig auf ihre eisigen, zerstörten Gliedmaßen.
languages.original_text: Frozen in a huddled pose, the corpse stares at his icy, shattered limbs in disbelief.

traits.locale_text: Die Leiche ist in gebückter Haltung eingefroren und starrt ungläubig auf ihre eisigen, zerstörten Gliedmaßen.

languages.text: Kıvrılmış bir vaziyette donan ceset, donmuş ve parçalanmış uzuvlarına şaşkınlıkla bakıyor.
languages.original_text: Frozen in a huddled pose, the corpse stares at his icy, shattered limbs in disbelief.

traits.locale_text: Kıvrılmış bir vaziyette donan ceset, donmuş ve parçalanmış uzuvlarına şaşkınlıkla bakıyor.
